# About

- This will contain lecture notes for the PS211 Introduction to Experimental Design. Despite its name, the course is primarily focused on introductory statistics with R
- Lecture notes will be updated throughout the semester, please check back frequently and contact me 
- Links to additional and supplemental readings will be listed in each chapter
